manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Protect Your Furniture with Plastic Chair Covers Plastic chair covers are a must-have when gathering the necessary moving supplies to get your possessions safely to your new home.

By simply slipping a plastic chair cover over your chairs before your move can save you a lot of money and disappointment. It will keep unwanted crumbs and liquids off your sofa, so even if your well-meaning moving buddy brings their muddy dog to moving day, it rains or all those movers end up with dirty hands by the time it's time to move the chairs, you can rest easy that your chairs won't suffer any damage. Chair covers are among one of the many useful items to have when moving house. They give you ideal protection for your furniture against dirt, dust, stains, bad weather, and more. Moving can be a big project for many individuals and families. While a professional moving company may be able to get a home's contents from one place to another, it's usually the homeowner's responsibility to make sure that all those items are properly packed. UBoxes chair covers are an excellent solution because they have protective features that will help create a less stressful move. No worries while piling items on and around your chairs during a move, chair covers will keep them safe. 2 Pack

High-Quality Durable These chair covers are made from a commercial grade polyethylene material that makes it extra durable for any way you plan to use it. Due to its puncture resistance, it can withstand normal wear and tear during the packing and moving of your house or for future renovation projects. During the move, you can be sure your chairs will be protected the entire time. It can also save you from the cost of buying extra packing materials. Thick This chair cover features a 2-mil thick commercial grade plastic, which is significantly stronger than your average plastic wraps. With its thickness, you will not worry about the plastic getting ruined and failing to protect your furniture. Thick chair covers are essential for moving chairs and when used properly it will eliminate the possibility of damage due to items packed together with it, careless handling and bad weather. Large The dimensions of these chair covers are 76" x 46”. It is extra-big and capable of overlapping your standard size chair from top to bottom. You won’t need to worry that the bottom part will become stained or dusty due to not being covered all over. It is large enough to ensure that your furniture will be well wrapped and protected from anything during moving or during the renovation of your home or office.

Multiple Uses Moving Use to chair covers when transporting them from one location to another to protect them from stains or scratches. Storage Use to keep messes off your chairs when closing your home for winter or summer months or while in long-term storage to protect them from UV damage and to keep them clean. Renovation Projects Use to cover your sofas during a renovation project to keep them safe from unwanted paint and building materials.
Let Uboxes help with that! Mattress CoversSofa CoversPicture PouchesBoxesBubble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars (This was fine for me since I wasn't moving
reviews.reviewText: I was leaving my apartment for about a week and a half, and since I was doing a lot of traveling, I had to leave my cat at home. Since I knew he would be angry at me, I wanted to get something to protect my furniture from his claws as well as anything that might... find its way out of the litter box. I have two chairs that I needed covered--one average sized single-sitter as well as a papasan chair.In one package you get two bags. The bags are sealed on three edges and they're open on one edge. I was able to slip the full in-tact cover onto my average sized sofa-chair--however, it only fit over the top and sides. It didn't completely engulf the chair. (This was fine for me since I wasn't moving, but if you're looking to use these to protect your furniture while moving, it might not be the best buy for you).On the papasan, however, I had to cut open two of the sides (it essentially just made one large flat sheet of plastic) so that I could lay it on top of the cushion. It worked well for my purposes, but again I wasn't moving.As for the quality of the plastic: It did its job pretty well. It's sufficiently water-proof, and there weren't any rips or imperfections when I got the product. However, the plastic is a lot thinner than I expected. My cat could have easily ripped through the plastic with his teeth/claws. In fact, if I wanted, I could probably have pulled the plastic apart with my bare hands with a little effort and pressure.So, all in all: Good quality and cheap for temporarily protecting furniture/floors. Probably not a good choice for protecting furniture while moving, as it will probably rip and/or won't be big enough to fit some pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This item came in handy during a previous move and the size and texture was better than expected. I'd definitely order this again and highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, large, but AWKWARD fit
reviews.reviewText: Good quality plastic, very large but it is weirdly shaped. I could not figure out how to position this on my chair. Really awkward. Eventually just plopped it on and tapped it down. But the taping ensures the plastic now is taped up and not so good for any second usage.
